name: Hiden'Seek
0:
”Alexa, ask Hide Seek to play”
”Alexa, tell Hide Seek I am safe”
”Alexa, tell Hide Seek to start game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hide seek
des:
Play hide and seek with Alexa!
Alexa will provide instructions to players, call out a countdown, and act as safe spot to return to. She might also have something fun to say for people who sneak back to her safely...
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
